location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Proposed Reserve Water Well No. 3. Sk. No. 103’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:250 x 180 mm, on sheet 270 x 180 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Blueprint sketch map produced by the Bahrein Petroleum Company, dated 14 August 1935, enclosed in a letter no. PA-247 (folio 205).Shows the land required for the purpose of drilling and operating water wells with oil pipeline and submarine line marked.
